ongoing.title: Smart Farming Demonstration & Training
ongoing.objective: Equip farmers with climate-smart and digital farming techniques to increase productivity and efficiency.
activities: Training on drip irrigation, greenhouses, and soil conservation.
Deployment of digital tools: weather apps, soil test kits, and crop disease detection.
Establishment of demonstration farms for hands-on learning.
impact: Increased crop yields with reduced inputs.
Lower production costs and enhanced food security.
Employment opportunities in agri-tech installation, irrigation, and farm extension.

ongoing.title: Agro-Innovation & Technology Projects
ongoing.objective: Modernize agriculture through technology and research-driven solutions.
activities: Drone mapping, spraying, and crop surveillance.
Partnerships with universities for agricultural innovation and training.
impact: Efficient water use and reduced energy costs.
Faster pest and disease detection improves yields.
Youth engagement in agri-tech and renewable energy jobs.

ongoing.title: Food Security & Nutrition Programs
ongoing.objective: Ensure stable access to nutritious food and reduce malnutrition in rural communities.
activities: Promotion of drought-resistant and bio-fortified crops.
Grain banks and storage facilities for surplus food.
School feeding programs and kitchen garden training.
impact: Strengthened household nutrition and local food availability.
Institutional markets provide guaranteed income for farmers.

ongoing.title: Farmers’ Empowerment & Cooperative Development
ongoing.objective: Strengthen farmer groups for collective action, financial literacy, and market access.
activities: Training in bookkeeping, savings, credit, and governance.
Linking cooperatives to microfinance, banks, and government programs.
impact: Improved access to credit and government support.
Stronger rural economies and community cohesion.

ongoing.title: Sustainable Livelihoods & Green Community Projects
ongoing.objective: Promote environmental stewardship and climate resilience while generating income.
activities: Agroforestry, tree planting, and organic farming training.
Composting, soil restoration, and renewable energy solutions.
Eco-friendly business development and carbon credit participation.
impact: Healthier soils and long-term climate resilience.
Cleaner, greener communities and improved public health.
New green jobs and premium market opportunities for farmers.

ongoing.title: Agribusiness & Market Access Initiatives
ongoing.objective: Transform small-scale farming into sustainable agribusinesses.
activities: Training in agribusiness management and value addition.
Connecting farmers to buyers, processors, exporters, and trade fairs.
Support for packaging, branding, and product diversification.
impact: Increased revenue and reduced post-harvest losses.
Enhanced export competitiveness and local economic growth.
Jobs in processing, packaging, and transportation.

past.title: Climate-Smart Agriculture Pilot
past.overview: Introduced greenhouses, drip irrigation, and soil conservation techniques to 200+ farmers.
achievements: Reduced water usage by 40% through drip irrigation.
Built local capacity through hands-on farmer training sessions.

past.title: Solar Irrigation & Agro-Tech Integration
past.overview: Implemented solar-powered irrigation systems and drone technology in pilot farms.
achievements: Enabled year-round farming despite erratic rainfall.
Improved pest and disease management, increasing crop quality and market value.

past.title: Food Security & Nutrition Programs
past.overview: Established grain banks, promoted bio-fortified crops, and supported school feeding programs.
achievements: Provided over 10,000 households with access to nutritious food.
Improved school attendance and performance through better nutrition.

past.title: Farmers’ Cooperatives & Empowerment
past.overview: Strengthened farmer groups for collective marketing, financial literacy, and access to credit.
achievements: Expanded access to government subsidies and microfinance programs.

past.title: Green Communities & Sustainable Livelihoods
past.overview: Promoted tree planting, organic farming, and renewable energy adoption.
achievements: Planted over 50,000 trees across project sites.
Supported establishment of 20 eco-friendly small businesses.
Created new income streams through carbon credits and organic produce.

past.title: Agribusiness & Market Access Projects
past.overview: Assisted farmers in value addition, branding, and connecting to buyers and export markets.
achievements: Enabled farmers to process and package products, increasing market prices by 30%.
Facilitated entry into regional and international markets.
Created jobs in processing, transportation, and marketing.
